creator: POST Luxembourg
descriptionHtml:
Track your data usage in real time using an intuitive and secure application.
Manage your options as well as those of your family, remotely and with total freedom.
Download the MyPost app free of charge and enjoy free assistance, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, in Luxembourg and when roaming.

The MyPost Telecom app allows you to:
- Keep track of your call, SMS, MMS and internet data usage in real time.
Simply swipe to scroll quickly through all data usage and find out how much of your allowance has been used in just a few seconds.
- Add or remove options for you and your family members.
Your loved ones can even contact you using push messages.
- Manage the profiles of your entire family…
You can grant or delete access rights for other users: primary administrator, administrator, authorised user or unauthorised user. Each member is allocated a suitable status.
- Personalise your space to make it easier to use. By accessing your contacts, the app will automatically add photos of your family members to your profiles.

The MyPost Telecom app is…
• Intuitive: because an app should always be easy to use
• Reactive: swipe to instantly scroll through data usage for calls, MMS, Internet, options, etc.
• Secure: for peace of mind

How does it work?
• Download MyPost Telecom free of charge
• Create your account easily
• Enjoy all the features 24/7 in Luxembourg and abroad
descriptionShort: Usage tracking and mobile plan management at your fingertips.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Your app always offers you more features! With this new version of MyPost, if you have several telecom services (Internet, TV and Mobile), you will be able to manage your loyalty benefits. The Pack Advantage is just waiting for you!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We make regular updates to the app to enhance your user experience. The latest release covers:

Your bill settings
– Select your billing language: Luxembourgish, German, French, English or Portuguese.
– Activate or deactivate itemised billing. You can configure which data you wish to view for each of your phone lines: national or international calls, SMS, MMS or internet.

creator: POST Luxembourg
descriptionHtml:
Track your data usage in real time using an intuitive and secure application.
Manage your options as well as those of your family, remotely and with total freedom.
Download the MyPost app free of charge and enjoy free assistance, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, in Luxembourg and when roaming.

The MyPost Telecom app allows you to:
- Keep track of your call, SMS, MMS and internet data usage in real time.
Simply swipe to scroll quickly through all data usage and find out how much of your allowance has been used in just a few seconds.
- Add or remove options for you and your family members.
Your loved ones can even contact you using push messages.
- Manage the profiles of your entire family…
You can grant or delete access rights for other users: primary administrator, administrator, authorised user or unauthorised user. Each member is allocated a suitable status.
- Personalise your space to make it easier to use. By accessing your contacts, the app will automatically add photos of your family members to your profiles.

The MyPost Telecom app is…
• Intuitive: because an app should always be easy to use
• Reactive: swipe to instantly scroll through data usage for calls, MMS, Internet, options, etc.
• Secure: for peace of mind

How does it work?
• Download MyPost Telecom free of charge
• Create your account easily
• Enjoy all the features 24/7 in Luxembourg and abroad
descriptionShort: Usage tracking and mobile plan management at your fingertips.

- Keep track of your call, SMS, MMS and internet data usage in real time.
Simply swipe to scroll quickly through all data usage and find out how much of your allowance has been used in just a few seconds.

Your loved ones can even contact you using push messages.
- Manage the profiles of your entire family…
You can grant or delete access rights for other users: primary administrator, administrator, authorised user or unauthorised user. Each member is allocated a suitable status.

• Reactive: swipe to instantly scroll through data usage for calls, MMS, Internet, options, etc.
